Description:
Brand New Metricon Build!
Clyde - 10 & 12 Mississippi Avenue are newly built and ready for you to move in, with the added benefit of First Home Owner Grant eligibility.
Designed to standout with exceptional finishes, light filled open plan living areas and a layout which is liveable for the whole family.
The well proportioned kitchen is certainly at the heart of the home and features stone bench tops, overhead cabinets, and European appliances. The kitchen overlooks the dining and living areas for seamless entertaining, and the alfresco provides the opportunity to flow outside when the weather is beautiful. The landscaped gardens are easy to care for, so there won't be too much maintenance required!
This stunning home offers a second living area complete with a cosy study nook, giving you the option of spreading out in the home or a retreat for unwinding after a busy day.
The master bedroom is equipped with a walk in robe and full private ensuite, with full windows for plenty of natural light. The remaining 3 bedrooms are good in size and feature mirrored sliding built in robes. The family bathroom is equipped with a separate shower and bath and has quality tiles throughout.
There is plenty of room for everyone at 10 & 12 Mississippi Avenue the only thing you need to do now is come and inspect this property yourself!
Features include:
- Stone bench tops
- Floating floorboards
- Master with walk in robe and ensuite
- Alfresco
- Easy to care landscaped front and rear gardens
- Double garage with internal access
- Separate laundry
Clyde is located only a short drive from freeway access and all amenities in the townships of Berwick and Cranbourne. The area is surrounded by multiple shopping centres. The town centre of Clyde offers a general store, post office and a community hall. Schools in the area include Clyde Primary, Hillcrest Christian College.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and vendor expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
PHOTO ID IS REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS

Description:
Polished home in a perfect location
Split over two pristine levels, this gorgeous home offers modern living at its best with Cavendish Avenue playground at your door step. Boasting quality upgrades throughout and a prime location this property is perfect as a first home, tidy investment or those looking for a lifestyle change.
First Floor features:
- 2 separate living areas.
- Well-appointed kitchen including 900mm appliances, stainless steel appliances, 40mm stone bench tops and plenty of cupboard space.
- Large dining area adjoining the kitchen.
- Powder room for guests.
- Study Nook
Second Floor Features:
- Large Master suite with unique feature lights, walk in robes plus en-suite inc. shower and toilet.
- Two more good sized bedrooms both with built in robes.
- Family bathroom plus separate toilet servicing upstairs.
Other Features:
- Evaporative heating and cooling
- Camera and alarm systems
- Lock up garage
And if all this wasn't enough wait until you see the location! The home is
Perfectly positioned close to Clyde Recreation Reserve, Shopping on Clyde, Casey Football Ground, St Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary School and public transport. What more could you need! Please contact us today to organise an inspection before it's gone.
Insights: 20 Honeybrook Lane, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
PERFECT DEVELOPMENT/ INVESTMENT OPPURTUNITY IN PROPOSED CLYDE SOUTH PSP.
PSP Property Group is excited to offer this amazing opportunity to purchase this 4.04 hectare (10 acres approx) land parcel, located in Clyde. Located within one of Victoria's major growth corridors.
SITE DESCRIPTION
This site is located on Derricks road in Clyde on 4.04 ha. The site is part of the Urban Growth Zone, a great investment property located in one of Victoria's major growth corridor.
LOCATION
Located 48 km from Melbourne CBD in Clyde, the site is close to many amenities and schools such as Casey Grammar School, Clyde Primary School, Cranbourne swimming pool and Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre and Cranbourne station which is a 12-minute drive.
KEY FEATURES
• A rare land banking or development opportunity.
• Easy access to the Melbourne CBD.
• Close to all amenities.
• Close Proximity to Cranbourne.
• 10 acres.
• 48 km MELBOURNE CBD.
• 80 km MELBOURNE AIRPORT.
• 12 mins CRANBOURNE.
• 12 mins CRANBOURNE TRAIN STATION.
Contact Gurpyar Sidhu on 0423425436 or Anand Jain on 0421406206 to arrange a inspection time or contract of sale .

Description:
IDEAL FAMILY HOME OR INVESTMENT ON 512m2!
An irresistible blend of style and spacious family home on approx. 512 m2 land size. A clever and unique floor plan, will suit growing families and guests.
Leading up from the charming landscaped front garden, you are welcomed by a grand entry which leads off to the gorgeous light-filled master bedroom. The master comes complete with a full ensuite, shower space and toilet facility, as well as a spacious walk in robe. The remaining three bedrooms are all finished with built in sliding door robes.
Functional, bright living spaces cater for formal and informal entertaining, including formal lounge/theatre and large open plan family and dining room and kids study nook.
Adjacent is the designer kitchen, at the heart of the home, with quality stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, range hood, gas cook top, large bench top and overhead storage space. All of this overlooking the dining area and outdoor entertaining zone. Quality sliding doors open to a spectacular indoor/outdoor open entertainment space, perfect for outdoor dining with friends.
Entirely in tune with modern demands, comprehensive features of this stunning, sun-drenched home include a large laundry, ducted heating, split-system heating/cooling, flyscreens, fly-door and a remote-controlled double garage with internal/external access.
Prominently positioned, take advantage of shopping at Clyde, nearby Medical centre, St Peters College, walking distance to Pasadena Park, public transport, childcare centres, Casey fields & Casey Race and easy freeway access to the M1 via Clyde Rd.
Enter the market with certainty in a fast-growing, family-friendly community!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS

Description:
Family Home That Ticks All The Boxes!
What a terrific opportunity to acquire this well-built low maintenance home or investment with everything you need.
This sensational home boasts four generous sized bedrooms; master with walk in robe & ensuite, two large open living areas plus another room that could be used as a study, kids retreat or cinema room, central bathroom & large laundry with rear access.
The kitchen is equipped with quality stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, stone benchtop & ample storage overlooking the open plan naturally light filled living and meals area that leads to a picturesque alfresco area & low maintenance rear yard.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating, split system air conditioning, double remote garage with internal access, low maintenance front & rear yards and so much more.
Situated on a generous sized corner block of 454sqm this truly is your ideal next home or investment as its currently leased at $1,738.00 per month.
Pasadena is nearby to Clyde Village township and within easy reach of the established retail centres of Berwick and Cranbourne whilst 5 minutes from state of the art sporting facilities at Casey Fields and Casey Sports and Recreation Centres. With access to public transport, including the nearby Cranbourne train station, and surrounded by a variety of education facilities with primary and secondary schools as well as the nearby Chisholm Institute of Tafe, families will be well connected at Pasadena.

Description:
NO PROGRESS PAYMENTS! TOP LOCATION!
Located in the prestigious leafy suburb of Clyde, perfectly positioned between both a thriving city and stunning parklands, Parkview on Clyde offers the perfect combination of community and location.
With Melbourne's vibrant city just 48.1kms away, and Shopping on Clyde down the road, residents have plenty of options when it comes to shopping and dining out. A reliable bus and purposed future train network all within walking distance, making travelling to and from the estate a breeze.
This welcoming community offers a wide range of amenities and activities to enjoy, whilst being close to all the local conveniences you need to continue to live an active and low maintenance lifestyle.
A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need!
Now is the time to take advantage of these quality townhouses which are ideal to live in or for investment.
The amazing benefits of these townhouses are as follows:
• Directly opposite Clyde Primary School
• Within walking distance to the Proposed Clyde Town Centre and Clyde Train Station
• No progress payments
• No Plans for Body Corporate
• Fantastic Rental Income of $370 to $390 per week
• Maximum saving on stamp duty (conditions apply)
• Full advantage of tax depreciation
• Brand new property with upgraded inclusions
• Receive an additional $10,000 Government grant if you are a 1St home buyer
No progress payments!
This is a huge attraction and means up until completion, there will be no loan payments or any loss of money. For example, if you were to build a brand new house and land package with another builder, you will be paying progress payments and would be charged interest during the entire building stage. With Parkview On Clyde, this is not the case. All that is required is a 10% deposit once finance has been approved and the balance of money is only due once your townhouse is completed.
Once completed a tenant will be organised to move in.
For more information visit: www.parkviewonclyde.com.au

Description:
EXQUISITE BRAND NEW HOME
Searching for a new home but do not want to go through the stress of building? 27 Pelham Drive is the perfect home and is ready to move into now!
You will instantly be amazed with the striking façade and street appeal of this home. Upon entry you will love the high ceilings and modern colour schemes throughout.
The open plan kitchen includes large island stone benchtop, plenty of cupboard space, stainless steel appliances and overlooks the living/dining area.
The master bedroom includes full ensuite and WIR, bedrooms 2, 3 and 4 all include BIRs and are serviced by the main bathroom which includes stone vanity, separate shower/bath and quality fixtures and fittings.
Entertainers will love the sliding door access to the undercover alfresco and professionally landscaped gardens.
Added features of this wonderful home include 2 seperate living areas, double garage, large laundry, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, downlights throughout and much more.
Located in the beautiful Eliston Estate with the masterplan including schools, reserves, parks, sporting facilities and located closely to public transport offering a wonderful place to live for your family.
Insights: 27 Pelham Drive, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Design Excellence with Quality and Versatility!
Premium features, flexible living zones and impeccable presentation highlight the appeal of this modern single level home on a approx 387m2 sized block, delivering an exceptional family lifestyle in the popular Clyde neighborhood. Impressive interior showcases four bedrooms (all with robes) , neat master ensuite & main bathroom . Add to this a lounge/dining area and contemporary kitchen with dishwasher and stainless steel cooking appliances. Other highlights of this family home include ducted heating and split-system air conditioning along with a private backyard and two car garage.
Lifestyle excellence in a prime family-focused location, its walking distance to , also close to freeways and shopping centres as well as easy access to public transport and shops.

Description:
Rest or Invest
This three year old, four bedroom home, built by SJD Homes is situated in Belmond on Clyde, is sure to impress.
Designed for modern families with master bedroom, including ensuite and WIR's at the front of the home, kitchen meals/family room just the place for the family to come together and space for the kids to the back of the house. A further three bedrooms, all with BIR's, living room and study nook complete the kid's zone.
Entertain family and friends in the chic kitchen with stone benchtops, ample storage, freestanding cooker, which flows seamlessly into the meals area and out to the undercover alfresco.
Extras include
• gas ducted heating
• evaporative cooling
• high ceilings
• double lock up garage with rear access
• landscaped gardens
• exposed aggregate driveway
All this within close proximity to schools, Casey Fields and public transport.
This property is currently tenanted at $1738 PCM and leased until 21 December 2019

Description:
** SOLD BY PAUL RINGERI **
EDGEBROOK ESTATE, CLYDE: **EXISTING FENCING IS AN IMMEDIATE MONEY SAVER** Requiring an estate offering family friendly living? Wanting to be within a brief drive to major shopping facilities and freeway access? This is definitely affordable buying for first timers so take advantage of the Government Grants on offer and buy with confidence today!
This oversized titled parcel of land measures a generous 571m2 and is in close proximity to future parkland. There are plenty of award winning designs to pick from with most builders having a huge selection of floor plans sure to suit your current situation.
Whether you are a young couple looking to break into the market, an established family needing extra room or someone who's seeking a lifestyle change it's all here at this thriving new development. Within Edgebrook there are planned parks with playgrounds, BBQ's and public artworks. It's an estate where community spirit will thrive. This vision will come to life with a carefully designed masterplan and future central park. Planned creek-front walkways and bikeways within the estate will encourage active lifestyles, whilst there are countless recreational and sporting facilities nearby.
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this outstanding opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre. With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by. Don't forget the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre which offers an abundance of funky cafes and restaurants!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
CONTACT US TO ARRANGE FOR A TIME TO VIEW THE SECTION 32 VENDOR STATEMENT!

Description:
Light Filled and Charming
CLYDE- This Porter Davis built home is sure impress, with abundant light filled spaces creating an immediate sense of home.
Upon entering, the entrance hallway will take you directly into the bright kitchen, dining and living room areas. The beautifully appointed kitchen features pendant lighting, a tiled splashback, 900mm oven with rangehood, stone bench top with breakfast bar, plenty of cupboard space and stainless steel appliances.
The open plan dining and living area is spacious, family friendly and entertainment savvy being overlooked by the kitchen.
Outside, the large raised platform entertainment space is the perfect spot to host a barbecue or sit back with a glass of wine. The backyard is easy care, with a landscaped front yard to greet you when you come home every day.
The master bedroom is well sized and comfortable featuring smart lighting, walk in robe and ensuite complete with his and hers vanity. The remaining three bedrooms offer built in robes, ceiling fans, with the main bathroom complementing the ensuite.
Topping off this gorgeous home is the second living area or kids retreat, giving the family extra space to live and relax in.
Features include:
Ducted heating & evaporative cooling
Ensuite with double vanity
Quality tiles throughout
900mm oven with rangehood
Raised platform outdoor entertaining area
Double car garage
Close proximity to dog park
Clyde is located only a short drive from freeway access and all amenities in the townships of Berwick and Cranbourne. The area is surrounded by multiple shopping centres. The town centre of Clyde offers a general store, post office and a community hall. Schools in the area include Clyde Primary, Hillcrest Christian College.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and vendor expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS

Description:
Modern Elegance on a spacious block!
Walk into this pristine brand-new home intended to bring one lucky buyer the feeling of comfort and luxury.
The property compromises of 4 spacious bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2 separate living zones:
- Master bedroom featuring a walk-in robe, ensuite with stone benchtops, double basin sinks, extra-large shower with niches and double shower head.
- All secondary bedrooms are equipped with built in robes.
- Bathroom featuring bath, shower, stone bench and separate toilet.
- Formal lounge/Theatre room.
- Massive family and meals area adjacent to the magnificent kitchen.
The open plan kitchen is the masterpiece of this remarkable property, consisting of stone benchtop, island bench, glass splashback, glass cantaloupe range hood, 900mm oven, cooktop and a huge walk in pantry.
Outdoors lovers prepare to be in awe as you find vast breathtaking gardens for you to enjoy in privacy, designed for you to escape into peace and tranquillity, surrounded by a landscaped garden that is manicured to perfection, with convenient access from the family dining area to an exhilarating undercover elevated alfresco area and all this on a great sized 443m2 block!
Other remarkable features include a generously sized store room which can be converted into a linen room, an extra walk in pantry or a prayer room the choice is yours, ducted heating, double lock-up garage, led down lights, artificial grass in the backyard, laundry with external access, 2.7 height ceilings and much much more.
The extra benefits of this amazing location is the close proximity to parks, upcoming railway station, state school and upcoming Westfield Shopping Centre.
Call Shabana today on 0411 216 186 or Khalil on 0421 711 125 to make your private viewing of this stunning home!

Description:
NO PROGRESS PAYMENTS & HUGE STAMP DUTY SAVINGS!
Located in the prestigious leafy suburb of Clyde, perfectly positioned between both a thriving city and stunning parklands, Parkview on Clyde offers the perfect combination of community and location.
With Melbourne's vibrant city just 48.1kms away, and Shopping on Clyde down the road, residents have plenty of options when it comes to shopping and dining out. A reliable bus and purposed future train network all within walking distance, making travelling to and from the estate a breeze.
This welcoming community offers a wide range of amenities and activities to enjoy, whilst being close to all the local conveniences you need to continue to live an active and low maintenance lifestyle.
A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need!
Now is the time to take advantage of these quality townhouses which are ideal to live in or for investment.
The amazing benefits of these townhouses are as follows:
• Directly opposite Clyde Primary School
• Within walking distance to the Proposed Clyde Town Centre and Clyde Train Station
• No progress payments
• No Plans for Body Corporate
• Fantastic Rental Income of $370 to $390 per week
• Maximum saving on stamp duty (conditions apply)
• Full advantage of tax depreciation
• Brand new property with upgraded inclusions
• Receive an additional $10,000 Government grant if you are a 1St home buyer
No progress payments!
This is a huge attraction and means up until completion, there will be no loan payments or any loss of money. For example, if you were to build a brand new house and land package with another builder, you will be paying progress payments and would be charged interest during the entire building stage. With Parkview On Clyde, this is not the case. All that is required is a 10% deposit once finance has been approved and the balance of money is only due once your townhouse is completed.
Once completed a tenant will be organised to move in.
Maximum saving on stamp duty!
When buying an established property you will be paying FULL stamp duty. This is not the case with Parkview On Clyde. Currently if purchasing an established investment property at $369,000 you will be paying approximately $15,800 in stamp duty. If purchasing off the plan at $369,000 you will be paying approximately $2,581 in stamp duty based on the Off The Plan Value (conditions apply). This is an instant saving of $13,219.
Using the Stamp Duty Calculator: https://www.nab.com.au/personal/loans/home-loans/calculators/stamp-duty-calculator#!#nab-loan-calc-results-stamp
(Casey Estate Agents will take no responsibility for accuracy or inaccuracy.)
For more information visit: www.parkviewonclyde.com.au

Description:
A modern beauty with 2 separate livings zones
Located in the tranquil Belmond on Clyde estate, we are proud to introduce this quality home. Sure to impress the most particular of buyers, the functional floorplan boasts two separate living zones, a beautiful kitchen and to top it off a fantastic entertainers area outside!
Features include:
- Generous Master suite with a walk in robe plus ensuite.
- Large open plan family living area with central kitchen and dining space.
- Kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, stone benchtops.
- Separate formal living area.
- Outdoor entertaining area overlooking the backyard for kids and pets to play.
- Double garage.
- Other features include ducted heating and downlights, upgraded quality fittings to both the kitchen and showers, landscaped gardens back and front, and much, much more
On top of the great features, contemporary design & street appeal this home offers, you'll also love all the abundance of facilities at your fingertips. Belmond is situated in the heart of the fastest growing suburb of Clyde and is only moments away from central Cranbourne and Berwick. Lush parks and open spaces make family time a breeze plus there is easy access to Shopping on Clyde, schools such as Clyde Primary, sports and recreation facilities it's got it all!
To ensure you don't miss out on this amazing opportunity please make sure you contact us to organize an inspection!
Insights: 12 Ayredale Street, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Porter Davis, 4 living areas on 512m2
Are you looking for an AMAZING family home with plenty of extras and convenient location? One that will have your family and friends in envy when they come to visit? Look no further we found it for you! Located in the premium Belmond on Clyde estate, we present to you this impressive one year old double storey residence that you will absolutely fall in love with.
Comprising of:
First Floor:
- Large decked staircase to entrance with double door entry.
- Open plan family lounge, living and dining area overlooking the alfresco.
- Well-appointed hostess kitchen - complete with gallery walk through and walk in pantry, island bench top with breakfast bar, under mount sink, 40mm stone benchtops and quality appliances including 900mm oven with 5 burner cooktop and dishwasher.
- 3rd separate living area / theater room.
- Powder room for guests.
- Fantastic entertainers alfresco perfect for entertaining a large crowd.
- Huge backyard with plenty of space for kids and pets to play as well as vegie gardens for the green thumbs.
- Double garage with internal access to the home.
- Gated side access through to the backyard perfect should you need to store a boat or caravan.
Second Floor:
- HUGE Master suite including large walk through robe and en-suite with double vanities, an oversized shower with extended niche plus ceiling rain water fitting.
- Three further generous bedrooms all built in robes.
- 4th lounge / retreat to relax.
- Family bathroom and separate toilet.
Extras include: Evaporative cooling and ducted heating throughout, feature pendants to kitchen and dining area, downlights, low maintenance gardens, beautiful exposed aggregate driveway, solar heated hot water THE LIST GOES ON!
On top of all the beautiful living space, contemporary design & street appeal this home offers, you'll also love all the abundance of facilities at your fingertips. Belmond on Clyde is situated in the heart of the fastest growing suburb of Clyde and is only moments away from central Cranbourne and Berwick. There are amazing parks and open spaces to enjoy making family time a breeze plus there is easy access to Shopping on Clyde, schools such as Clyde Primary, sports and recreation facilities it's got it all!
This home is in a league of its own please contact us to not miss out on this unique opportunity.
Insights: 11 Capstone Street, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New and Park Facing
Situated in the prestigious Eliston Estate is this quality brand new residence which is ready for you to just move in.
Set on an impressive 593sqm park-facing, rectangular-shaped corner block and boasting a range of upgraded features demands your attention and consideration.
The residence itself has been meticulously designed with modern day family dimensions and is ready for the future.
As you enter, the high ceilings add to the sense of space in this already spacious home. On the left the master bedroom is accessed by double doors and allows you unencumbered park views. The front living area also has double doors and is primarily designed as a theatre room to accommodate modern living requirements. Opposite is an enclosed study/office or even a 5th bedroom in case you need to cater for additional guests!
The heart of every home is the kitchen and this one will certainly impress with its layout and accoutrements. Two open-plan zones emanate from the kitchen with which you can design as your dining and family areas or whatever tickles your fancy.
Separately tucked away are the three additional bedrooms serviced by a central bathroom. Outdoor is a undercover alfresco and a blank canvas for the front and side yards limited only by your imagination.
Uncover the next best thing the Southeast has to offer and come home to 19 Pump House!
This property is available for private inspection most days. Just send us an email enquiry and we will automatically respond with the available open times.
To ensure there is enough demand to inspect the property, please advise us of your wish to attend by simply following these instructions.
- Book inspection
- Select a date and time based on the options displayed
- Enter your details
- Select 'register inspection time'
You're finished! We'll keep you updated if anything changes, but otherwise we look forward to meeting you at our Hodges Open for Inspection.
**Photo ID required at ALL inspections.
Insights: 19 Pump House Crescent, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Why build when you can move in right away
Beautifully presented, light bright and lovingly cared for this Simonds home is the best for family living, with 4 generous bedrooms, front master bedroom with walk-in robe and full en-suite with double vanities, family bathroom plus a theatre or second living room. Large open plan kitchen with walk-in pantry, 900mm range cooker and dishwasher and family meals and dining area with slide stacking doors opening to the rear of the property. Other Features include:
- High ceilings
- Stone benches
- Timber floors
- Double lockup garage with Internal access
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative Cooling
Sensational location close to Clyde Recreation Reserve, Shopping on Clyde, Casey Football Ground, St Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary School and public transport.
